name: My egg and I - Ludum Dare 46
name_original: My egg and I - Ludum Dare 46
description:
Get the egg safely to your home.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move Left and Right.

"M" or "X" key to Jump

"N" or "Z" key to Shoot

Sound resources from:

https://opengameart.org/content/cheerful-1-choro-bavario-happy-loop

https://opengameart.org/content/penguin-sfx

https://opengameart.org/content/shotgun-shoot-reload

https://opengameart.org/content/11-male-human-paindeath-sounds
